about_the_game:
Prepare for a journey unlike any other with "Inu: Loas'Fate," an innovative strategy game that immerses you in the Bayou. Here, the boundaries of reality blur, and the mystical traditions of Haitian vaudou add a unique flavor to your adventure. Become Inu, Loa of transformation, and conquer the trials set by other Loas to strengthen the forces of Vilokan, your new home.



  • Revolutionary Reverse Tower Defense: Forget everything you know about tower defense games. In "Inu: Loas'Fate," you create waves of monsters to attack and overwhelm enemy towers. Experience the thrill of being the one who fight in this genre-defining twist.
  • Mixing: Create unique waves of monsters by mixing ingredients. Enhance your creatures with new abilities !
                          
  • Deckbuilding: Build and customize your deck with powerful summons and unique spells. Strategize and adapt your approach to each new challenge with a roguelite system that ensures no two playthroughs are the same.
  • Immersive Vaudoo : Dive deep into the rich and vibrant world of vaudoo. Interact with legendary Loas like Papa Legba and Marinette, and explore the mystical bayou.
  • Strategic and Tactical Gameplay : Plan your moves meticulously, manage your mana wisely, and unleash devastating attacks. Upgrade your creatures and spells in the Great Cuisine to enhance your invocations.
  • Procedural: Each trial presents a new set of challenges with a semi-procedural generation system. Tailor your experience by selecting your opponents, trial duration, and specific challenges.



Prepare your deck and venture into the heart of the bayou. Summon waves of powerful creatures, cast strategic spells, and watch as your army march through to enemy towers. Destroy the Potomitan of each archipelago to earn rewards and upgrade your deck. Every decision matters in this fast-paced, tactical gameplay experience.



Become part of our vibrant community. Wishlist "Inu: Loas'Fate" on Steam, join our Discord and share your feedback with us.
